subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Cardinals outfielder Juan Encarnación will miss the remainder of the season, and his career is in jeopardy after he sustained multiple fractures of his left eye socket when struck by a foul ball Friday night.The 31-year-old Encarnación was hospitalized for continued observation, evaluation and treatment. The team said in a statement that the long-term prognosis was “undetermined at this time.”.
